forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers after 5pm. Mostly sunny. High near 73, with temperatures falling to around 71 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
